title: BanShell
description:
Hack dedicated to my friend BanShell and to all shell lovers.

- If you don't like shell levels avoid your negative comments.
- Yumps are easier to do.

I hope you like my work good luck and have fun .

title: üê∏ü•£
description:
A hack full of short levels and silly ideas that I foolishly took the time to polish.
I hate it, but I also think it's cool.

(pronounced "Frog Soup")

title: Kaizo Marathon
description:
The blood is pumping through your veins. Your vision is getting blurry. Your palms are sweaty. Something about spaghetti. The experience of being deep in a long level is totally different. This is what a true gauntlet gamer lives for. And it's why I decided to make an ultra-long kaizo level.

This 1 exit hack has 5 long rooms of easy kaizo. There are no checkpoints.

Will you step up to the challenge?

title: Super Mario World: Season 3
description:
This is a SMW:S2 sequel, Bowser once again Kidnaps Princess Peach from the Peach's Castle,
Mario's adventures in Mushroom Kingdom continues in Season 3.

Is integrated to SA-1 and also it has old mechanic games like the traditional non-scroll death screen and new mechanics in the future
